actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to extend the provisions of section 231 thereof--relating to coverage of persons of Japanese ancestry who were interned during World War II--to such persons who were not citizens of the United States.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Extends the provisions of Title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) (relating to coverage of persons of Japanese ancestry who were interned during World War II) to such persons who were not citizens of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to extend the provisions of section 231 thereof--relating to coverage of persons of Japanese ancestry who were interned during World War II--to such persons who were not citizens of the United States.
